1. Start by selecting the difficulty level of the game (easy, medium, or advanced).

 2. Once the game has loaded, you will see the picture puzzle on the screen, divided into a number of different pieces. 3. The objective of the game is to arrange the pieces in the correct order to complete the picture.

 4. To move a piece, simply tap and hold on the piece you wish to move, and then drag it to the desired location.

 5. Try to place the pieces in the correct location as quickly and efficiently as possible to achieve the highest score.

 6. If you get stuck and cannot figure out where a piece belongs, you can always hit the shuffle button to randomize the pieces and start over.

 7. Keep playing and trying different strategies to improve your high score and become a puzzle master!

1. Start by opening the online picture puzzle game on your device and log in to your account or create a new one if you don't have one already.

 2. Once you are logged in, you will be prompted to enter a partner ID. This is the ID of the player you want to play with.

 3. After entering the partner ID, you will be taken to the game screen where you will see the picture puzzle.

 4. The goal of the game is to solve the puzzle as quickly as possible. To move a piece, simply tap and drag it to the desired location.

 5. As you move the pieces around, the game will keep track of your time and the number of moves you make.

 6. Once you have successfully completed the puzzle, the game will show you your final time and the number of moves it took you to solve it.

 7. The winner of the game is the player who solves the puzzle in the least amount of time and with the least number of moves.

 8. You can also play with different partner, and compare your score with them.

 9. You can also see your past score, and try to improve it.
